sentences.en: a flower press
sentences.cn: 压花器

sentences.en: a trouser press
sentences.cn: 熨裤机

sentences.en: Bank robberies, burglaries and muggings are reported almost daily in the press.
sentences.cn: 报纸上几乎每天都有抢劫银行、入室行窃和拦路抢劫的报道。

sentences.en: David McNeil is travelling with the White House press corps.
sentences.cn: 大卫·麦克尼尔正和白宫记者团一同前行。

sentences.en: He faced the press, initially, in a somewhat subdued mood.
sentences.cn: 他最初面对媒体时情绪有点忧郁。

sentences.en: He gave the okay to issue a new press release.
sentences.cn: 他同意发布一篇新的新闻稿。

sentences.en: He pressed a card into her hand before leaving.
sentences.cn: 离开之前他往她手里塞了一张卡片。

sentences.en: How had this com-promising picture come into the possession of the press?
sentences.cn: 这张令人难堪的照片是怎么落到媒体手中的？

sentences.en: I felt that if I had pressed him he would have lent me the money.
sentences.cn: 我觉得如果当时我逼着他要，他会把钱借给我的。

sentences.en: Lily pressed the switch and plunged the room into darkness.
sentences.cn: 莉莉按下开关，房间里顿时漆黑一片。

sentences.en: Local feeling does not necessarily concur with the press.
sentences.cn: 当地人的感受未必与媒体一致。

sentences.en: Manville kept his back pressed flat against the wall.
sentences.cn: 曼维尔后背紧紧地贴在墙上。

sentences.en: Once again, the "Free Press" prefers not to highlight these facts.
sentences.cn: “自由新闻”组织再次故意不去突出强调这些事实。

sentences.en: Oxford University Press
sentences.cn: 牛津大学出版社

sentences.en: Politicians want a lap-dog press which will uncritically report their propaganda.
sentences.cn: 政客们想要的是不问是非、甘为他们搞宣传的哈巴狗一样的新闻媒体。

sentences.en: Press the lever until you hear the catch engage.
sentences.cn: 压下挡杆，直到听到挡挂好。

sentences.en: She had rung off before he could press her for an answer.
sentences.cn: 他还没来得及催她回答，她就挂断了电话。

sentences.en: She pressed the gas pedal and the car leapt forwards.
sentences.cn: 她踩下油门，汽车向前冲了出去。

sentences.en: She was besieged by the press and the public.
sentences.cn: 她被媒体和公众纠缠不休。

sentences.en: the freedom of the press
sentences.cn: 新闻自由

sentences.en: The press mogul befriended the high and mighty in Britain.
sentences.cn: 这位报界大亨和英国的显贵达人们交情甚好。

sentences.en: The Spanish media were still sniping at the British press yesterday.
sentences.cn: 西班牙媒体昨天仍然在攻击英国媒体。

sentences.en: To close your document, press CTRL+W on your keyboard.
sentences.cn: 关闭文件时要同时按键盘上的CTRL键和W键。

sentences.en: We were able to watch the books rolling off the presses.
sentences.cn: 我们可以看到书本从印刷机上源源不断地印出。

sentences.en: We've never had a good review in the music press.
sentences.cn: 我们从未在音乐媒体获得过好评。

words.tran_cn: 加压的；有使血压增高的；收缩血管的
增压；密封；使…加压（pressurize的过去式）
密封；增压；使……加压，使……压入
压；按；新闻；出版社；[印刷]印刷机

phrases.tran_cn: 动力印刷机，电动印刷机
记者招待会，新闻发布会
(非正式，主北美)（要人，政客）握手问候
拥挤：握手并和许多人混在一起，尤指在竞选公职时

trans.tran_cn: 报纸，新闻记者，印刷机，出版社，榨汁机，挤压，拥挤的人群，衣柜
trans.tran_en: to be criticized in the newspapers or on radio or television
a piece of equipment used to put weight on something in order to make it flat or to force liquid out of it

trans.tran_cn: 压，按，把…塞入，紧握（手或臂），推搡着移动，催促，坚持，压平，熨烫，压榨，压制，用力踩，极力要求，困扰，硬给
trans.tran_en: to push something firmly against a surface
to push something firmly against a surface
